name.baseName: Aluminum electrolytic capacitor production ; Aluminum current collector foil for lithium-ion batteries ; Anode foil slitting ; 0.12mm anode formed foil aluminum roll
铝电解电容器生产 ; 锂离子电池用铝集电箔 ; 阳极箔分切 ; 0.12mm阳极成型箔铝卷

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 阳极箔分切 ; 铝电解电容器（AEC）生产 ; 420V 680uf

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The investigated manufacturer produced about 1.183 billion AECs of all kinds in 2020.

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the production process of 0.12mm anode formed foil aluminum rolls used as current collector foils in lithium-ion batteries, and slitting process involved in Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitor (AEC) manufacturing. These components are crucial in the electronics industry for high-performance energy storage solutions, such as those found in portable consumer electronics, electric vehicles, and stationary energy storage systems. The production data pertains to a factory in Jiangsu Province, China, reflecting large scale industrial manufacture of AECs with applications in various electronic devices requiring capacitors for circuit functionality.
此数据集描述了0.12mm阳极成型箔铝卷的生产过程，该铝卷用作锂离子电池中的集电箔，并涉及铝电解电容器（AEC）制造中的阳极箔分切工艺。这些组件在电子行业中至关重要，用于高性能能量存储解决方案，如便携式消费电子产品、电动汽车和固定能量存储系统中。生产数据来自中国江苏省的一家工厂，反映了AECs的大规模工业生产，这些AECs在需要电容器以实现电路功能的各种电子设备中有应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of capacitor production come from the AECs’ production factory in Jiangsu Province, China. The cut-off criteria of LCI data collection for each process is coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. The inventory data of anode foil production and cathode foil production is obtained based on the analysis of the manufacturing processes and corresponding process parameters. The upstream data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi software (Version: 10.6.1.35). In detail, the profile of Chineses electricity grid from the China Electric Power Yearbook adopts the reference year 2016. The reference year of aluminum ingot production is 2015. The inaccessible data about ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3 are estimated based on chemical equations using the existing materials (reactants) in the Gabi software. The use and end-of-life stage inventory data are obtained based on analysis and calculation.

电容器生产的库存数据来自 AEC 位于中国江苏省的生产工厂。每道工序的 LCI 数据收集的截止标准是至少覆盖输入流和输出流 95% 的质量和能量。阳极箔生产和阴极箔生产的库存数据是根据生产工艺和相应工艺参数分析获得的。上游数据（即铝锭、分选纸、运输、电力和水）来自 Gabi 软件（版本：10.6.1.35）。具体而言，《中国电力年鉴》中的中国电网概况以 2016 年为基准年。铝锭生产的基准年为 2015 年。无法获取的柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、NH4H2PO4 和 HBO3 数据是根据 Gabi 软件中现有材料（反应物）的化学方程式估算的。使用和报废阶段的库存数据是通过分析和计算获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).
Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this life cycle inventory (LCI) data, ensure that the scope of your assessment aligns with the coverage of at least 95% of mass and energy flows as per the cut-off criteria. The inventory encompasses anode and cathode foil production along with the relevant upstream data sourced from Gabi software, matching the technological background of the year 2016 for the Chinese electricity grid, and 2015 for aluminum ingot production. Users should note that certain data regarding chemicals were estimated using equivalent materials available within the software, hence adjustments may be necessary when modelling for precision-critical applications. It is advised to consider the use phase behavior and end-of-life inventory data cautiously, especially in systems where the capacitor's performance might have a significant impact.

使用此生命周期库存（LCI）数据时，请确保您的评估范围与至少涵盖95％的物料和能量流的切割标准一致。盘存包括阳极和阴极箔片的生产以及从Gabi软件来源的相关上游数据，与中国电网的2016年技术背景和铝锭生产的2015年匹配。用户应注意，关于化学品的某些资料是使用软件中可用的等效材料估计的，因此，在模型化精准度至关重要的应用程序时可能需要调整。建议在系统中电容器性能可能具有显着影响的情况下，谨慎考虑使用阶段行为和生命周期末期库存资料。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
